message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $60.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $50 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $65.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with $55 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $62.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the negotiation. I would like to counter with $57.50 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell it to you for $62.00.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $59.50 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm getting close, but I still need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $61.00.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiation. I would like to counter with $58.50 for the product.
